QuestData.Title: Riding the Red Rocket
QuestData.Description: You there, $r! Get your lousy carcass over here!$b$bThe Alliance have a shipment of lumber all ready for transport just northeast of here. Since getting our hands on that wood is out of the question, there's only one thing to do - destroy it!$b$bThe goblin at the end of the dock here has some torpedoes all ready to go. He's got all the fuel for them on the docked goblin ship to the north.$b$bGet some fuel, then commandeer one of the torpedoes and ride it into their ship.$b$bDismissed!
QuestData.LogDescription: General Gorlok at the lighthouse in Venture Bay wants you to destroy the Alliance Lumber Boat.$b$bGeneral Gorlok will only be present at the lighthouse when the Horde has it in their possession.
QuestData.CompletionText: Has that Alliance lumber been burned yet, $c?
QuestData.RewardText: Ha hah! What a ride, eh $c?$B$BIf we can't control the resources here, then no one can!$B$BWhen will those puny Alliance pests realize that they are no match for the might of the Horde?
